column1:
Enter cron expression

* * * * *
| | | | |
| | | | +---- Day of the Week (range: 0-6, 1 standing for Monday)
| | | +------ Month of the Year (range: 1-12)
| | +-------- Day of the Month (range: 1-31)
| +---------- Hour (range: 0-23)
+------------ Minute (range: 0-59)
Example: 0 0 * * * Daily at midnight

Read more about cron expressions - here
